description: Geneva is very wealthy, but not everyone is rich and now it has the world's highest minimum salary.
title: Geneva: Why the world's highest minimum wage was needed
title_page: Geneva: Why the world's highest minimum wage was needed - BBC News
maintext: Businesses offering less than 23 francs an hour will now have to give employees a pay rise. To have to bear this new cost in the middle of the Covid pandemic and a drastic drop in profits could cause more harm than good, fears Vincent Subilia of Geneva's Chamber of Commerce.
